website_summaries.verdict: Value buy available in both youth and adult sizes. Neutral white and gray practice pants with a flexible fit. Pads are thick and well-designed.
pros: Moisture-wicking polyester/spandex blend with high tensile strength for players who are hard on their gear
Strategically placed groin mesh for ventilation
Sizing is accurate across the board
Will last through an entire season of practice
cons: Inconsistent quality, and some people feel rear padding is insufficient

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. My 15 year old, 230 pound, 6'1" lineman can tear up some gear and these have held up incredibly well. I will absolutely buy again. The pads are very well made and a great price. I told all the moms on the team about them because they're at such a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Goood butt...
customer_reviews.text: My son liked these. He’s a linemen, but the only negative was that he thought they could use some more padding on the butt. They held up well, and if your boy stays off his butt sounds like these were good.
customer_reviews.author: Mari W

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The high school football team calls this a girdle. The fullback I bought it for loves it. It fits well, lasted the whole season and still has no holes. Good value considering how well it’s holding up.
customer_reviews.author: sharonzbox

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a last minute replacement after our son showed us his current gridled was lacking and had holes. The pads are very soft. Easily washed but recommended air drying. He reported they were very comfortable and moved well.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mens Medium for my son- 160 lbs, 5'8" fit PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a men's medium for my 14 year old son; [160 lbs, 5'8" and still growing.] These fit PERFECTLY and he's thrilled with how they feel!... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teen boys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 150 pound 8th grader. I bought a large. They fit great with some room to wear them another year or more. They wash well and I lay them out to dry. The built in pads are so helpful because he is never struggling to switch his pads between practice and game pants. These are a MUST for unorganized teen boys playing football!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and protection
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage down to the knees. I also sized up but they are true to size. I put another pair of tights on to keep them secure. No issues with pads moving around washed and dried more than 4 times. I would recommend I am a defensive lineman player for women’s full contact football #wfa
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Low rise, rides down
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased with the compression padded top. While the sizing of the top was accurate, the bottoms seem to run small. They seem to ride low and want to creep down when the athlete bends. Other than this, the legs fit well for my son who has strong legs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son for high school football. he loves it and so does all of his coaches. Protects all the areas that is needed and still hold his cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are convenient and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Son who plays High School football and he loves them. No more pulling the pads in and out of pants and having to wear a girdle.
customer_reviews.author: Jailcop

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson is a a goalie for lacrosse. This is the second pair we have bought and they offer ample protection. He loves the fit.
customer_reviews.author: ferrets4ever

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. You pay for whst you get. I got great protection. The pads will protect him. I must have for your football player
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the girdle fit my son. The material is soft and light and the best part about it, it will grow with him.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and my freshman son said the fit was great and they are working out fine for him playing football. Considering how expensive other brands are, these are a great product for the price. I wash them in the machine at least 4 times a week and let them air dry and we haven't had a single issue with them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Sizing as expected. Our last pair last 2 seasons and is still used occasionally as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far my son likes them a lot. He’s 5’9 and 170lbs and we bought a large. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old wore these all season including practices and they are still in great condition. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: raquel

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Good price and does what it should save your money you don't need name brand no one's going to see them anyways and does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good material fits well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old boy for football. He is 5'4 110 lbs. I bought a youth large and they fit perfect. Good material too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pads are not removeable
customer_reviews.text: This item looks like poor quality. I am going to keep because it’s required for football and I am on a budgets I wish the pads were removable and I wish it was tighter. I guess I’ll have to wait and see if it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's always a leap when ordering stuff like this online. We're convinced we chose the best option available and thrilled with having avoided pricier options we liked far less.
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of integrated pants but the quality of these are not good. 11 year old ripped these after about 7 practices and 3 games.
customer_reviews.author: shawn powell

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it has all the pads needed to play football and be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIRDLE
customer_reviews.text: MY SON LOVES THIS GIRDLE. HE WANTED ONES WITH THE KNEE PADS AND THESE WERE A GREAT CHOICE. VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son they fit perfect and he likes them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the pads.They are great quality and fit is perfect.Very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Smwvufan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good quality. My son never complained once about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son well and he loved them. Much easier to use then the pads in his pant (according to him).
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect fit. My High Schooler uses them and likes them. Bought a second pair to help us since he needs to wear them 4 days a week. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: CbinNH

customer_reviews.title: High School Football
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson wears these for high school football and they have worn and washed well. Giving him the protection that he needs when he plays. Would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice complete set of pads
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed, the knee pads are a little different then what is shown in the picture but still work.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Tewksbary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son liked this! Provided extra support during football under his pads!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my 16 yo, comfy and well built easy to just throw in washr.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my son. Works great and easy to use for football
customer_reviews.author: Mariogon2000

customer_reviews.title: Great girdle
customer_reviews.text: My son like the fit and the pad placement was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HONEY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Held up well for the entire season plus 3 weeks of playoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11 year old son. Light weight form fitting. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emil Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Well padded
customer_reviews.text: My son needed this for HS football. Easy to get clean and Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far, they've held up great in practice and my son likes them
customer_reviews.author: Katie O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect. I will buy another pair when he goes out of this pair. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gouzien

customer_reviews.title: Did the job well
customer_reviews.text: Son used them for the season and liked them much more than the standard issued gear. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: GET IT
customer_reviews.text: I luv it fits perfect made it through varsity season
customer_reviews.author: Da boss

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as describe, good quality product, washes/cleans well and padding holds up.
customer_reviews.author: MClay

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed product. The pads are a lot better than most girdles on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best football gear ever
customer_reviews.text: My grandson play football they were the best tights ! He enjoyed them very much ! Thanks amazon u have the best items!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit Perfect on my grandson and wouldn't hesitate to order another pair for him
customer_reviews.author: sylvia carlos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good stitching, good fabric, love the extra breathable sections & good padding.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit, pads exactly where they go, nice comfy material
customer_reviews.author: VSMCM

product_meta.title: CHAMPRO Adult Man-Up Integrated 7 Pad Girdle
product_meta.description: The TRI-FLEX cushion system provides the ultimate combination of protection and flexibility. Low-profile TRI-FLEX ventilated hip pads rise above the waist. Contoured, ventilated thigh pad system with hard plastic shock plates. High-compression, Polyester/Spandex DRI-GEAR moisture management fabric. Cup pocket.
feature_bullets: FLEXIBLE: The Tri-Flex cushion system provides the ultimate combination of protection and flexibility; it uses low-profile padding designed with Tri-Flex pads that flex to conform to the player's body.

BUILT-IN PADS: The contoured, ventilated thigh pad system conceals hard plastic shock plates, while low-profile Tri-Flex ventilation hip pads rise above the waist. Designed to cushion the hips, thighs, and knees.
COMFORTABLE: DRI-GEAR technology wicks away moisture, keeping players drier and more comfortable.
COMPRESSION FABRIC: Made of a Poly/spandex blend, the 4-way stretch fabric with high-compression fit allows players to move easily throughout the game.
CUP POCKET: A built-in cup pocket provides space for athletes to insert their own cups.
